title: MetaMask Crypto Wallet Removed from Apple App Store
description: MetaMask is reportedly looking into the issue, while other wallet apps remain available.

title: Can global regulators really curb the fake news frenzy?
description: The digital age, with its innovative technological advancements, has unarguably improved global communication. Yet, it has also ushered in a floodgate of misinformation. title: Binance CEO, colleagues face potential indictment in Brazil
description: Brazil's National Congress is targeting Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao and three of the firm's employees. The firm says it is cooperating extensively with the committee.
